title: un tiruvaDiyE aDaindEn
sahitya: Un tiruvadiye adainden kandaa          Umaiyal arumai mainda   anupallavi Enakku pugal neeye enru tuninden           En tuyarai unnidame kooruven    caraNamUnakku nigaraavar evaru milar         Un marma thai ariyadavar palar         Unnmai arinda uttama devan         Pan murai tudikkum bharani bhaktan
